attributes.action: to allow rent properties to allow pets
attributes.additional_details: We been thinking about this problem for years. We thought if one day we need to rent t a house , we may have trouble because we have a small chihuahua. And today we finally is in need of looking for a house to rent and have been asking about 20 houses in 2 weeks and no one is accepting us due to we have a chihuahua. I feel it’s not fair in the pets , they’re not all naughty dogs. Our dog just sleeps all day . Something needs to be change about to rule
attributes.background: To have rent properties to allow pets

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Ban Blanket No Pet Clauses in Tenancy Agreements & Leases.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566355
